_comment: Linux x86_64 build profile for GCC/Clang with NVIDIA CUDA GPU acceleration
_description: This profile builds DupFinder for Linux x86_64 using Ninja and system GCC/Clang with CUDA GPU support. Produces DEB, RPM, and TGZ packages.

targets.notes: Requires CUDA toolkit (11.x or later) and GPU drivers on Linux. Edit CUDA_HOME and Qt6_DIR to match your local installation.
